ModMetaData.name: MorrowRim - Telvanni Technology
ModMetaData.author: SirMashedPotato
ModMetaData.description:
This is a beta release, certain technology paths are currently missing, and balance is likely very questionable.

This mod adds in several new medieval research topics, all based on Great House Telvanni from Morrowind. Research how to grow several new exotic plants. Use the new resources harvested from these plants to craft elixirs that passively boost your pawns, or create powerful energy staves.

-Supports Vanilla Achievements Expanded.
-Supports SeedsPlease.
-Patches in elixirs for: The Birds and the Bees, Rimatomics, A RimWorld of Magic, SwimmingKit.
-Based on the 'Elder Scrolls' series by Bethesda Game Studios.
-Sounds used made by Mike Koenig from http://soundbible.com/
